description:
**** Are you looking for the Word of GOD to change your life and situation?

**** Do you want to master the letter to the Ephesians? ****

**** Do you want to know GOD and His Word more? ****

**** Are you ready to become an expert, knowledgeable person like Ezra or Apollos?


Then you have come to right place!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In this course you will learn why the Letter to the Ephesians is one of the most famous books of the New Testament, its theological contribution and how you can apply its life transforming truths into your life.

Beginning with an introduction and history we will move on to explore 7 Key Lessons that you can immediately apply to your life and begin reaping the benefits. I can say that because of what the book has done in my life and in the lives of many others. More importantly the Word of GOD is living and active!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Over 900 Students enrolled in the first course (Book of Philemon)

It also had an average rating of 5:0

One student review says: Excellent Study! - I really enjoyed this in-depth study of the very short book of Philemon. My eyes were opened to some truths I had not seen before, and I got a lot out of this course. I also love the way Mr. Tokan pointed out the business side of this book, Negotiation. That was a pleasant bonus! I look forward to more biblical studies from Boomy Tokan.- Aaron Lindsey

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Updated for this course

11/11/15 Learn to recite scripture - watch me recite Ephesians 3

More updates soon!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are key benefits you will derive from the study of this book and I want to highlight a few

  1. All poor self esteem thoughts will be eradicated from your mind as you come to realise you are indeed a new creation
  2. You will know who you are in CHRIST and that will boost your confidence with GOD and man
  3. You will learn how to pray and get results
  4. You will realize and effectively deploy with accuracy and knowledge the power given you over spiritual forces
  5. You will come to place of immense love, respect and awe for GOD through CHRIST JESUS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I trust you will also partake of what the SPIRIT of GOD wants to communicate to you as you embark upon this study. I assure you of a depth of truth like no other, a knowledge of who you are in CHRIST and the understanding of what JESUS achieved for you on the cross.

Once you grasp the essence of the book to the Ephesians other Bible books will become more open to you. The reason is that this letter details the work of CHRIST like no other one does.

In this study of the Letter to the Ephesians you will learn profound truths about:

  • GOD’s choice
  • Your place in His eternal plan
  • Prayer
  • Your position in CHRIST
  • Your new origin
  • GOD’s power in you
  • The mystery of the Gospel
  • Gentiles and Israel together as one
  • Marriage
  • GOD’s love for you

I appeal to you to fully engage with the lectures so that you will be forever changed in JESUS NAME!

And so much more!

All those who have used the prayers from the letter to the Ephesians testify to tremendous power being made available to them during their time of engaging with the word. I am personally looking forward to your own life changing encounter too – GOD is no respecter of persons!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important information before you enrol:

  • You are covered by a 30 day money back guarantee, full refund, no questions asked!
  • You also have unlimited, lifetime access to the course!
  • You will enjoy free access to any updates I will provide
  • You are free to ask any questions and will get a reply as soon as possible
  • You can preview lectures 7 and 9

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All those who have used the prayers from the letter to the Ephesians testify to tremendous power being made available to them during their time of engaging with the word. I am personally looking forward to your own life changing encounter too – GOD is no respecter of persons!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Get Started Today - Click Take This Course NOW!
title: Bible Study: Ephesians - 7 Lessons We Can Learn For Today!
